# Anwar Ali Sehar | SEO & AI Specialist

Professional portfolio of Anwar Ali Sehar, a Local SEO & Digital Marketing Specialist, AI Tool Builder, and Local Business Growth Mentor.

## Core Expertise
- Local SEO Growth: Google Business Profile, Location-based SEO, Off-Page SEO, Lead Gen.
- AI-Powered Tools: Educational AI, SEO Automation, Geo Data Extraction, Custom Dashboards.
- Training & Mentorship: Practical skills for local market demand.
